<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Team Switch </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Invoke the [[Team_Switch|Team Switch]] dialog (force it even when conditions are not met).
There has to be at least one playable unit for team switch to work, and for this command to work in MP, respawn type in [[description.ext]] should be 5 (SIDE).<br><br>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Informative </title><part><name index="1"/><value> When player switches and leaves behind AI unit, you need to enable "TeamSwitch" AI on it <tt>_unit [[enableAI]] "TeamSwitch"</tt> so that the unit continues with [[waypoints]]. </value></part></template> </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[teamSwitch]] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[teamSwitch]];</code> </value></part><part><name>Example 1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[Team Switch]], [[enableTeamSwitch]], [[onBriefingTeamSwitch]], [[onTeamSwitch]], [[teamSwitchEnabled]], [[selectPlayer]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
